title: Toldos Avrohom Yitzchok Rebbe Update
body: Toldos Avrohom Yitzchok Rebbe released from hospital, returns home in Meah Shearim after showing improvement in condition.

title: IDF Denies Goldin Remains
body: Israel's IDF rejects claims that fallen officer Hadar Goldin's remains are being held in a Rafah tunnel, calling the reports false and damaging to his family.
